properties.sfomuseum:description: Two-page advertisement from Holiday promoting Pan American World Airways, titled “Around the world on a 2-week vacation for only $1564”; main image of stewardess presenting meal tray to passenger in sleeping berth; four small images at left depicting various tourist scenes; separate black and white advertisement on reverse of part b promoting Baitch & Castaldi clothing manufacturer featuring TWA (Trans World Airlines) jet.
